TextBody:
Hello Glenn,

Thank you for your time in today's session.

In the meeting we have installed the latest EPP client version and reproduce the issue encountered. 

I have forwarded all the details to our Engineering team and as soon as I receive an update I will inform you accordingly.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.netwrix.com



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Thank you for getting back to us. 

Let's schedule another meeting, in which we will check one more time if the option has been successfully enabled. 
IF the situation persist afterwards, we will collect a set of logs and escalate this case to our R&D team for further analysis. 

Please provide us your availability for this week.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,

Hello Glenn,

Thank you for getting back to us. 

On the CAP policy, under the policy exit points, you should have the Print screen option, that need to be enabled.


Please check and let us know if the situation persist .

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
